## ||[**HOME**](https://brianwang9100.github.com)||[**BIOGRAPHY**](Biography)||[**CONTACT**](Contact)||
### ABOUT ME
Hi, my name is Brian Wang. I am a CS Major at Georgia Institute of Technology. I am a teacher, an Eagle Scout, and a programmer who is looking to broaden his skill-set. As an iOS game developer I have a huge range of skills ranging from class architecture and object oriented programming, to UI-design and marketing. Nice to meet you!

### RESUME
[**Link to my resume**](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B9mexo7XVY6sd3Q3a1FRN3Jyemc/view?usp=sharing)

### LANGUAGES AND TECHNOLOGIES
Objective-C, SpriteBuilder, Cocos2D, Swift, Java
 
Other Skills: Leadership, Public Speaking, Product Marketing, UI design
